name: Safety Training Module
description:
Safety Training Module

Pick the module you want to train on and enter a virtual world. When complete either pick another module or quit the simulation.

For Windows;

"W" and "S" to walk forward and Backwards

"A" and "D" to go sideways

mouse left click to open doors and turn on lights, flush toilets, turn on sink water!

mouse click and hold to pick up objects and release to drop
